title: Our new home in SF
text: Fabulous location, lovely decor, well-equipped room, helpful staff, plentiful breakfast right outside your room, free wine every night ~ what else do u want??? Room 607 was comfortable & quiet enough. Perhaps most importantly, absolutely everything was CLEAN CLEAN CLEAN. About 3 short blocks away from cheap public bus that goes all over town to most of the sights & neighborhoods u definitely want to see. Will stay here on every future visit to SF. Enjoy!
